nodes.text: The Chasdemonus Route was a hyperspace lane in the Unknown Regions. It started at Naporar, a star system within the core territory of the Chiss Ascendancy, one of the most significant governments in the area. After spinning off the hyperroute called the Path of the Houses, it headed west towards space outside the Chiss core territory, passed through the Colonial Station Cam'co system, and curved toward galactic north.

The Chasdemonus Route was portrayed in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, on the map depicting the Chiss Ascendancy's core territory and its immediate vicinity. The end point is not specified in the book.
